thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 21 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wuhan Tianyu Information Industry sees 2017 net profit up 0.8 pct to 26 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wuhan Tianyu Information Industry sees 2017 net profit up 0.8 pct to 26 pct

organizations.name: wuhan tianyu information industry co ltd

text:
Jan 22(Reuters) - Wuhan Tianyu Information Industry Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to increase by 0.8 percent to 26 percent, or to be 20 million yuan to 25 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 19.8 million yuan
* Says that increased product sales and tax rebate as the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Uidu4i
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
